step1.title: What kind of gin do you want to drink today?

hint.title: Did you know that...
hint.description: The logo and color of the Bombay bottle are inspired by the Star of Bombay: a 182-carat sapphire originally from Sri Lanka. A true gem!

step2.title: How do you want it to be?

hint.title: Did you know that...
hint.description: Ivano Tonutti, Bombay's Master of Botanicals, sifts the entire globe to select the best botanicals that give each gin an unmistakable aroma!

sapphire.title: Try Bombay Sapphire!
sapphire.description: 10 botanicals from certified sustainable sources and distinctive steam infusion method: Bombay Sapphire, with its balance and aromaticity, is what you need today!

premier.title: Try Bombay Sapphire Premier Cru!
premier.description: An excellent raw material highly selected and treated with artisanal procedures: the citrus taste of Lemon of Murcia that characterizes Bombay Sapphire Premier Cru is what's right for you today!

presse.title: Try Bombay Pressé!
presse.description: A natural infusion of fresh lemons, without sugar or other artificial flavourings: today for your aperitif choose the freshness and delicacy of Bombay Pressé!

sunset.title: Try Bombay Sunset!
sunset.description: Spicy tones of turmeric and cardamom, accompanied by hints of mandarin: Bombay Sunset is a real explosion of aromas, perfect for your aperitif!
